pageContext.claim: “You know, we're building four hospitals, four medical centers and many other things we've developed and sent thousands of -- thousands of ventilators. And hopefully, they're going to do well but you know you have decide - - this has to be managed by local government and by the governors. It can't be managed by the federal government.”
pageContext.analysis: Governors have vocally asked for more federal assistance and coordination rather than to manage the crisis at a local level. Moreover, the government had not sent thousands and thousands of ventilators -- they paused production.
